thread.section_title: SmartBuyGlasses New Zealand Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SmartBuyGlasses New Zealand | smartbuyglasses.co.nz
thread.title: Zayne
thread.title_full: SmartBuyGlasses New Zealand reviewed by Zayne

author: Zayne
title: Zayne
text: I ordered prescription lenses online last week Sunday and was sent an email notification that I would receive my order within 3-5 working days. Today is day 5 and I have not yet received my order. I specifically needed my order for this weekend. The 0800 number in Wellington is non existent and the company uses an automated email response. Could a consultant from SmartBuyGlasses please contact me still in today to advise the progress of my order or any delays?
